title: birAna varAlicci
sahitya:
birAna varAlicci brOvumu ninnu nera nammiti


anupallavi

  purAri manOhAriNI shrI kAmAkSi


caraNam 1    tAmasamu sEyakanE nIvu karuNAnidhi gAdA parAmukhamika nEla vinu sarOjamukhi
    caraNam 2    kAmitArtha phaladAyakI dEvI natakalpalatikA purANi madhura vANi shivuniki rANi
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdari gaurI paramEshvari girijA anAtha rakSaNambu salupaga rAvE
